EventStory.Body:
Tikkurila Oyj to Discuss PPG Industries Inc's Voluntary Recommended Public Cash Tender Offer Call
PITTSBURGH Dec 30, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of Tikkurila Oyj M&A conference call or presentation Friday, December 18, 2020 at 12:30:00pm GMT
TEXT version of Transcript
